summary: The National Institutes of Health helps coordinate federal agencies' activities that promote the health and well-being of people with autism. We reported that NIH has followed several practices to help these agencies work well together. But it could be doing more, and we recommend ways to help. This is an "Easy Read" version of our report. Easy Read is a way some groups make their...
title: SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL FOR GAO-24-106446: Strengthening Coordination and Monitoring of Autism Activities in the Federal Government
